auth.dashboardSubtitle: Log in to your tutor dashboard

booking.title: Book a lesson with {tutorName}
booking.noAvailability: No availability in the next 14 days
booking.contactDirectly: Please contact {tutorName} directly to schedule a lesson

accessRequest.pendingMessage: Your request to book lessons with {tutorName} is under review. You'll receive an email once approved.
accessRequest.approvedMessage: Great news! {tutorName} has approved your request to access their booking calendar.
accessRequest.deniedMessage: Unfortunately, {tutorName} is unable to accept your booking request at this time.

tutorSignupPage.title: Create your account.
tutorSignupPage.subtitle: Start your free trial. No commitment.

forgotPasswordPage.title: Reset your password
forgotPasswordPage.subtitle: Enter the email you use for TutorLingua and we'll send a reset link.

publicProfileNotFound.title: Tutor profile not found
publicProfileNotFound.description: The tutor page you tried to visit is not live. The link may be misspelled, unpublished, or the tutor moved to a new URL.
publicProfileNotFound.hint: Looking for a specific tutor? Double-check the spelling or ask them for their latest TutorLingua link.

studentSignupPage.title: Student Sign Up
studentSignupPage.createSubtitle: Sign up to find tutors and start learning

studentForms.errorAcceptTerms: Please accept the Terms & Conditions and Privacy Notice
studentForms.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
studentForms.termsNote: I understand TutorLingua only facilitates connections and is not a party to, nor liable for, any agreements between tutors and students. I consent to AI processing of my data and learning content as described in the Privacy Policy.

requestAccessPage.cardTitle: You were added as a student
requestAccessPage.cardBody: Set a password and confirm your details to unlock bookings.
requestAccessPage.fastPathTitle: Fast path to your first class
requestAccessPage.fastPathBody: Complete the form, then pick a time on the next screen.
requestAccessPage.formSubtitle: Create your login and request calendar access with {tutorName}.

publicBooking.requestMessageLoggedOut: To view {tutorName}'s calendar and book lessons, please log in or create an account. Your tutor will review your request and send payment instructions.
publicBooking.requestMessageLoggedIn: To book lessons with {tutorName}, you need to request calendar access. Once approved, you'll be able to see available time slots and book directly.

accessStatus.pendingMessage: Your request to book lessons with {tutorName} is under review. You'll receive an email once approved.
accessStatus.deniedMessage: Unfortunately, {tutorName} is unable to accept your booking request at this time. Please contact them directly for more information.
accessStatus.suspendedMessage: Your calendar access has been temporarily suspended. Please contact {tutorName} to resolve this.
accessStatus.step2: You'll receive payment instructions via email
accessStatus.step3: Once approved, you can book lessons from the calendar
accessStatus.step4: You'll get email confirmations and reminders
accessStatus.resendNote: Didn't receive a confirmation email? Check your spam folder or request a new one.
accessStatus.deniedNote: If you believe this was a mistake, please reach out to {tutorName} directly.

bookingCancelledPage.title: Booking Cancelled
bookingCancelledPage.message: Your booking was not completed. No payment was processed.
bookingCancelledPage.noteBody: The time slot you selected may still be available. You can try booking again if you'd like.

bookingSuccessPage.notFoundBody: We couldn't find your booking information. Please check your email for confirmation.
bookingSuccessPage.serviceUnavailableBody: Please check your email for booking confirmation.
bookingSuccessPage.paidDescription: Your payment was successful and your booking is confirmed. You'll receive a confirmation email at {email}.
bookingSuccessPage.unpaidDescription: Your booking request has been submitted. You'll receive a confirmation email at {email} with payment instructions.
bookingSuccessPage.meetingOn: Your lesson will take place on {provider}.
bookingSuccessPage.paymentInstructionsFallback: Your tutor will send you payment instructions via email shortly. Please check {email} for details.
bookingSuccessPage.paymentConfirmedBody: Your payment has been processed successfully. The funds will be transferred to your tutor.
bookingSuccessPage.stepPay1: Complete payment using the instructions above
bookingSuccessPage.stepPay2: Check your email for confirmation and meeting details
bookingSuccessPage.stepPay3: Your tutor will confirm once payment is received
bookingSuccessPage.stepPay4: You'll receive a reminder 24 hours before your lesson
bookingSuccessPage.stepPaid1: Check your email for confirmation details
bookingSuccessPage.stepPaid2: Add the lesson to your calendar
bookingSuccessPage.stepPaid3: You'll receive a reminder 24 hours before your lesson
bookingSuccessPage.stepPaid4: Join the meeting link at the scheduled time

perfectRecall.title: Perfect Recall
perfectRecall.description: Every lesson is transcribed automatically. Students search for that one word they forgot three weeks later. Nothing slips through.

invisibleInsights.title: Invisible Insights
invisibleInsights.description: Speaking time, vocabulary patterns, common mistakes—tracked silently in the background. You teach. The system watches.

homeworkThatWrites.title: Homework That Writes Itself
homeworkThatWrites.description: Review exercises generated from the lesson itself. Based on real errors, not generic templates.
